subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Evp maker with speakjet allophone
author: Snowfire Lioness
full_text:
----------MB_8CDB396DD0F9BAE_1ACC_2A9DC_webmail-d053.sysops.aol.com
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"

Being no expert myself, David the Tech says, it's very hard for spirit to c=
ontrol that device because it will spill out it's own type speech with ever=
y wave of their energy, and sometimes it just says a word every couple time=
s that is not their own. =C2=A0 The device on Skype can work if you can rea=
ch either William, Bill C. guardian angel or David the tech, or just stay w=
ith a radio, and listen carefully, it's getting easier for me now, they are=
 talking more into their own mics, bringing the words clearer now, which is=
 great.=C2=A0 And because they have formed a line going into the light, the=
re is more order over there now, it's not so noisey because even most the b=
adies are getting a second chance to be in the Kingdom where there is Light=
, so they are not yelling and cussing so much now. sf 



-----Original Mes=
sage-----
From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...>
To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Fri, Mar 18, 2011 2:11 am
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re:=
 Evp maker with speakjet allophone

          =C2=A0                       =
            I think you would do better with normal human speech for the ra=
w audio. 
 
 F-S
 
 --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "blueeyedwolf1977" <=
sellington3629@...> wrote:
 >
 > I downloaded evp maker tonight, w=
ith the speakjet allophones add on...my honey and I are sitting here listen=
ing to it, and it first was just plain babble...but I swear I am hearing th=
ings come across....he thinks I'm full of it, but, I don't know...anyone el=
se use this before? If so, am I just hearing things, or...? 
 > Thank yo=
u for any and all feedback!!
 >
 
 
      
                 
   
       =

  


----------MB_8CDB396DD0F9BAE_1ACC_2A9DC_webmail-d053.sysops.aol.com
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8"

Being no expert myself, David the Tech says, it's very hard for spirit to c=
ontrol that device because it will spill out it's own type speech with ever=
y wave of their energy, and sometimes it just says a word every couple time=
s that is not their own.   The device on Skype can work if you can rea=
ch either William, Bill C. guardian angel or David the tech, or just stay w=
ith a radio, and listen carefully, it's getting easier for me now, they are=
 talking more into their own mics, bringing the words clearer now, which is=
 great.  And because they have formed a line going into the light, the=
re is more order over there now, it's not so noisey because even most the b=
adies are getting a second chance to be in the Kingdom where there is Light=
, so they are not yelling and cussing so much now. sf <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
-=
